title: Agenda Ecológica

contents:
Distill is a publication format for scientific and technical writing, native to the web.
Learn more about using Distill at https://rstudio.github.io/distill.


library(tidyverse)

ggplot(mtcars, aes(disp, mpg)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth() +
  labs(title = "A boring plot")



  theme(text = element_text(family ="Roboto"))

  ..$ face         : NULL

  ..$ vjust        : NULL
  ..$ angle        : NULL
  ..$ lineheight   : NULL
  ..$ margin       : NULL
  ..$ debug        : NULL
  ..$ inherit.blank: logi FALSE
  ..- attr(*, "class")= chr [1:2] "element_text" "element"
 - attr(*, "class")= chr [1:2] "theme" "gg"
 - attr(*, "complete")= logi FALSE
 - attr(*, "validate")= logi TRUE

title: Bienvenido al blog de la Agenda Ecológica
description: En este blog se plasma el conenido principal de la Agenda Ecológica de la Agenda Ciudadana de Tulum Sustentable!
